tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SensorData (
    sensor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_type VARCHAR(255),
    sensor_value FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    contract_triggered BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  data_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  value NUMERIC NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE smart_contracts (
  contract_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  contract_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  contract_address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  trigger_condition TEXT NOT NULL,
  action TEXT NOT NULL,
  last_triggered TIMESTAMPTZ
);

CREATE TABLE sensor_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    sensor_type TEXT,
    sensor_value FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    triggered_contract INT
);

CREATE TABLE SensorActions ( 
    action_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    sensor_id INT, 
    action_type VARCHAR(50), 
    action_description TEXT, 
    triggered_at TIMESTAMP, 
    FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES SensorData(sensor_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE ContractLogs ( 
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    contract_id INT, 
    log_message TEXT, 
    logged_at TIMESTAMP, 
    FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES SmartContracts(contract_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE sensors (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_name VARCHAR(255),
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
    location_id INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    data_value FLOAT,
    data_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    data_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE actions (
    action_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    action_name VARCHAR(255),
    contract_id INT,
    action_trigger TIMESTAMP,
    action_status VARCHAR(20)
);
